pr_title: Optimized the AND and OR FEEL operations

timeline.message: Optimized the AND and OR FEEL operations to not evaluate the right operand if not required

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
return rightAND == Boolean.FALSE ? rightAND : null;
return rightAND == Boolean.FALSE ? false : null;
timeline.author: tarilabs

replies.author: tarilabs
tarilabs

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
return rightOR == Boolean.TRUE ? rightOR : null;
return rightOR == Boolean.TRUE ? true : null;
timeline.author: tarilabs

replies.author: tarilabs
tarilabs
